sourcesContent:
import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react'; import {Col,Container,Modal,Button,Form,Table,Card,Accordion} from 'react-bootstrap' import config from '../config'; import AlgoPNLChart from './AlgoPNLChart'; function AlgoDetailsModal(props) { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const [positions, setPositions] = useState([]); const [trades, setTrades] = useState([]); const [chart1,setChart1] = useState([]); const [chart2,setChart2] = useState([]); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); useEffect(()=>{ console.log("Calling algo details..") console.log(props) console.log(props.details[props.name]) console.log(props.details.pnlchart) console.log(props.details.diffchart) setChart1(props.details.pnlchart) setChart2(props.details.diffchart) setPositions(props.details.positions) setTrades(props.details.trades) },[props.details]); return ( <>
{props.name} Positions {positions.map((item,key)=>( ))}
Security Symbol Exchange Currency Position Avg Cost Current Px Profit/Loss
{item.security} {item.symbol} {item.exchange} {item.ccy} {item.amount} {item.avgcost} {item.currentprice} {item.pnl}
Trades {trades.map((item,key)=>( ))}
Security Symbol Exchange Currency Size Direction Price Trade Time
{item.security} {item.symbol} {item.exchange} {item.ccy} {item.size} {item.direction} {item.tradedprice} {item.time}
); } export default AlgoDetailsModal;
